course_title: Topics in Religion - TPCS IN RELIGION

001.comments: Humour in the Bible and the Ancient Near East. Visit cnrs.ubc.ca for full course descriptions. Cross-listed with NEST 401, RELG 500B. Majors and Honours seminar in Classical, Near Eastern and Religious Studies.COURSE RESTRICTIONS: If you do not meet the restrictions for this course or if the course is full, please register in the waitlist for RELG475B and you will be moved into one of NEST401 or RELG475B if a spot becomes available. Majors in CNRS specializing in Religious Studies receive priority registration.RELG MAJORS: If this course is full and you are a CNRS student who needs this course to graduate, please email cners.advising@ubc.ca

WL1.comments: Waitlist for RELG475B and NEST401. Priority will be given to students majoring in CNRS in the Near Eastern Studies and Egyptology or Religious Studies streams, followed by all other students specializing in CNRS, followed by students in other specializations. You will be moved into either RELG475B or NEST401. If you prefer one course code over the other, please contact cners.advising@ubc.ca.

description: Consult the course registration information each year for offered topics.
